data.text: But now, you people of Israel, listen to Yahweh, the one who established your nation.
When you experience dangerous situations,
because I am Yahweh, your God,
I will cause other countries to be conquered, instead of your country;
Do not be afraid, because I am with you.
I will command the rulers of the nations to the north and to the south,
Allow all those who belong to me [MTY] to return,
Summon the people who have eyes but it is as though they are blind;
Gather people of all nations together,
But Yahweh says, “You people of Israel ◄are my witnesses/know what I have done►,
I, only I, am Yahweh,
I said that I would rescue your ancestors,
I am God, the one who has existed forever and who will exist forever;
Yahweh, the Holy One of Israel, is the one who rescues you; and this is what he says:
I am Yahweh, your Holy One,
I am Yahweh, the one who opened a path through the water,
Then I summoned the great army of Egypt
But do not think only about what happened in the past, long ago [DOU].
Instead, consider the new thing that I am going to do.
The jackals/wolves and owls and other wild creatures will thank me
I will do that for the people whom I have created and chosen to belong to me,
But now, you descendants of Jacob, you refuse to request my help.
You have not brought to me sheep or goats for offerings that will be completely burned on the altar;
You have bought for me fragrant reeds,
I am the one who is able to forgive you for all your sins;
Tell me what I have done that you do not like.
No, what has happened is that the first ancestor of you Israelis sinned against me,
That is why I have caused your priests to be disgraced;
